about_the_game:
A thorough crackdown on the underworld has been initiated by the City Hall of Serbia! Koushuk the former leader of the Black Shadow gang, loses everything in this catastrophic operation. However, through a fortunate turn of events,Koushuk becomes an unofficial member of the police force, working as an undercover cop.

However, due to recent reports of a serial killer on the loose, people in this small town, within the jurisdiction area, are highly vigilant. During an investigation, Kosatsuki encounters the enigmatic detective girl, Yana Mai.

Amidst the presence of cult followers, the peculiar town, the impending threat of the serial killer, and the conspiracy of the Crimson Lotus Society, the fate of these two girls intertwines. As they navigate through countless events, their ultimate destiny remains uncertain.





Experience an immersive gameplay of over 20 hours with a rich storyline, extensive side quests, and engaging missions.

Engage in thrilling battles using the intricate Dragonbone combat system, accompanied by stunning skill performances. Each character boasts unique and adorable models and animations!

Explore a variety of gameplay mechanics, including gathering, alchemy, cooking, item appraisal, and skill trees, ensuring a diverse range of activities to fulfill your gaming desires.

With the inclusion of a dynamic time system, the world undergoes different changes as day turns into night.

Prepare for multiple endings! The game offers both a regular ending route and a true ending route, adding depth and replayability to the overall experience.





20 hours and more

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: IntelE5300 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel i5 8400 or AMD R5 2500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 50 GB available space

short_description: Embark on the journey to your envisioned future! In this Japanese-style role-playing game infused with elements of microcosm and yuri, you will take on the perspective of Koushuki, a former gang girl. Experience the profound changes unfolding in the Serbian town through a series of events.
